name: Evernote Sync
author: Gaowei Tang

sections.description:
1. The plugin applies to Evernote and Yinxiang.com;
  2. Add “posts” tag Evernote will automatically sync to WordPress;
  3. About synchronization every 30 minutes;
  4. Synchronous including categories, tags, titles, content and pictures contained;
  5. The same name tags of Evernote synchronization into WordPress categories;
  6. Other Evernote tags are all synchronized to the WordPress label; (except for “posts”)
  7. Timed publish, draft publish;
  8. Auto format article content;
  9. Custom the label for synchronization;
  10. Support for Yinxiang(china) and Evernote Authorization to get the token.

Plugin Site:
http://www.biliyu.com/evernote-sync

Author Email:
tanggaowei@foxmail.com
sections.installation:
1. Upload evernote-sync folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Go to “Settings > Evernote Sync”, select the platform and developer token, then save;
  4. To the need to synchronize the notes add “posts” tag;
  5. You can also go to the Settings page of plugin to manually synchronize.
sections.changelog:
3.0.0

  • Support for php 8.

2.0.7

  • Tested in v6.1.1.

2.0.4

  • New feature: Synchronization the width, height, and style of the image.

2.0.0

  • New feature: Support for Yinxiang(china) and Evernote Authorization to get the token.

1.3.1

  • New feature: Support for Yinxiang Authorization.

1.2.16

  • New setting: Whether to format the content.
  • New setting: Whether to generate excerpt.
  • New setting: Set count of each sync.
  • New function: Clear sync record.
  • Add donate link.

1.2.12

  • At the same time support the Evernote time and the WordPress time to set the post time.
  • The default value is the WordPress time, you can set to the Evernote time in the Evernote Sync settings page.
